amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to carry out Operation Choke Point.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to carry out Operation Choke Point.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A080) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A080) offered by Mr. Luetkemeyer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A080) Agreed to by voice vote.
